lead_paragraph: Wayne Rooney roared back to form with three goals yesterday to lead Manchester United to a 4-0 victory at Bolton Wanderers, helping United jump ahead of Chelsea at the top of the English Premier League. Rooney, 21, had not scored since the first day of the season.
